text: Alex Antônio de Melo Santos, or simply Alex (born April 16, 1983), is a Brazilian former football midfielder. ==Club statistics== Updated to 23 February 2019.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 221 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2016J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑", 10 February 2016, Japan, (p. 211 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑 2015 (NSK MOOK)", 14 February 2015, Japan, (p. 163 out of 298) Club Season League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup AFC AFC Total Total Club Season Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Kawasaki Frontale 2002 20 1 3 2 – – 23 3 Avispa Fukuoka 2003 40 2 3 0 – – 43 2 2004 36 4 2 1 – – 38 5 2005 35 4 0 0 – – 35 4 2006 30 2 0 0 2 1 – 32 3 2007 45 26 2 1 – – 47 27 Kashiwa Reysol 2008 28 5 5 0 4 1 – 37 6 JEF United Chiba 2009 22 0 1 0 3 0 – 26 0 2010 33 7 0 0 – – 33 7 Kashima Antlers 2011 30 1 2 0 3 0 5 0 35 1 2012 5 0 0 0 2 0 – 7 0 Tokushima Vortis 2012 14 3 2 1 – – 16 4 2013 32 1 1 0 – – 33 1 2014 33 1 1 0 3 0 – 37 1 2015 26 1 1 0 – – 27 1 2016 17 1 1 0 – – 18 1 Kamatamare Sanuki 2017 18 0 0 0 – – 18 0 2018 35 0 0 0 – – 35 0 Total Total 483 59 24 5 17 2 5 0 527 66 ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Minas Gerais Category:J1 League players Category:J2 League players Category:Kawasaki Frontale players Category:Avispa Fukuoka players Category:Kashiwa Reysol players Category:JEF United Chiba players Category:Kashima Antlers players Category:Tokushima Vortis players Category:Kamatamare Sanuki players
